feed.title: Movary Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.60.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Add option to hide person from top actors by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/525
  • Feature: Add option to hide person from top directors by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/526
  • Feature: Show cast character names on movie pages by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/528
  • Feature: Show movies in your watchlist on person pages by @sahinakkaya in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/545
  • Feature: Add and adjust parameters of some API endpoints by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/535
  • Fix: Jellyfin export broken with sqlite by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/533
  • Fix: Use cached person images consistently on the dashboard by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/546
  • Fix: Update imdb rating scrapping with latest html changes by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/550
  • Docu: How to configure Trakt.tv api access by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/529

New Contributors

  • @sahinakkaya made their first contribution in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/545

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.59.0...0.60.0

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.61.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Add new filter to "All movies" page for personal ratings (e.g. only show movies with ratings between 8-10) by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/562
  • Feature: Add optional position to watch dates (useful to sort multiple movies watched on the same date) by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/548
  • Refactor: Update to php 8.3 by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/555
  • Refactor: Extend TMDB person sync logging with what data changed by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/567
  • Fix: Remove wrong links on dashboard for most watched genres and languages by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/553
  • Fix: Stop deleting existing person data when adding new movie (with already existing persons in its credits) by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/568
  • Fix: User data is not removed when the user is deleted (only happend with SQLite) @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/558
  • Fix: Wrong release date set for movies which have no release date on TMDB yet by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/554

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.60.0...0.61.0

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.62.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Customize the application name by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/573
  • Feature: Add timezone selector to server settings by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/574
  • Feature: Add API endpoint for retreiving an auth token by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/575
  • Feature: Add API endpoint for destroying tokens by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/584
  • Feature: Add API endpoint to check authentication by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/582
  • Fix: Imdb rating scraping by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/605
  • Fix: Correctly validate api request token expiration date for access by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/597
  • Refactor: Improve session handling by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/591
  • Refactor: Change token header name by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/593
  • Refactor: Add middleware to verify valid auth for user page read access by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/599
  • Docs: Add phpstorm code style scheme and documentation by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/588
  • Maintenance: Update Swagger UI to 5.12.0 by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/601
  • Maintenance: Update dependencies by @JVT038 in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/594

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.61.0...0.61.1

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.62.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Session related login issues by @Davilarek in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/606

New Contributors

  • @Davilarek made their first contribution in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.62.0...0.62.1

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.62.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix imdb rating scraping by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/608
  • Fix button not correctly dis/enabling in movie details modal by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/609
  • Fix PWA cookie issue logging user out after app restart by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/610

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.62.1...0.62.2
